channel.title: HyBrid PvP v3 client, connect to localhost
channel.description:
Hello.
I have downloaded HyBrid PvP v3 and I would like to make the Client connect to localhost. I know that I have done this some time ago but I can't remember how I did it. I asume it is somewhere in Client.java but I can't find it.
Can someane tell me where I can change it please?
Remi1115

item.title: HyBrid PvP v3 client, connect to localhost
item.dc:creator: @Remi1115 Remi1115
item.description:
@Remi1115 wrote:

Tension Ltd:

okay go to client.java if you don’t have a gui.java, once in client.java search for server and an ip will show up and either type 127.0.0.1 or 0.0.00, Hope I Helped

It worked!
Thank you very much.

Remi1115.

Read full topic
item.source: HyBrid PvP v3 client, connect to localhost
